projects.title: Google Maps Api - Hotels
projects.subtitle: Angular
projects.content: This application let the user to view a list of hotels in an area, interacting with markers on the map or titles from the list to get info. Also a search function is available.

projects.title: Music Player
projects.subtitle: jQuery
projects.content: This is a music player with basic functions. Shuffle and repeat features are also disponible. Some other feature is the search from the playlist.

projects.title: CRUD Application
projects.subtitle: Angular
projects.content: This is a simple CRUD application with Angular Material styling elements. Other features like searching and view data after category filters are available.

projects.title: Radio with clock alarm
projects.subtitle: Angular
projects.content: This is a radio with 5 radio stations. Clock and alarm are also available. After alarm is fired you will be able to snooze it for 1 minute or stop it.
